comments: Jaquez Jr. (MIA) and Fontecchio (DET) engage and disengage with one another and marginal contact occurs off-ball.
As Duren (DET) rolls to the basket he briefly grabs and releases Martin's (MIA) jersey without affecting his defensive position.
Fournier (DET) legally contests Rozier's (MIA) jump shot attempt.
Jaquez Jr. (MIA) legally contests Stewart's (DET) jump shot attempt.
Adebayo (MIA) establishes himself in Fournier's (DET) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Fontecchio (DET) cleanly blocks Rozier's (MIA) driving shot attempt.

After communicating with the Replay Center, the courtside administrator overturned the 2pt. basket by Adebayo (MIA) to a shot clock violation. Adebayo does not release his shot attempt prior to the expiration of the shot clock, and possession is correctly awarded to the Pistons.
Martin (MIA) establishes himself in Cunningham's (DET) path and does not deliver illegal contact.
Cunningham (DET) moves laterally into Robinson's (MIA) path and marginal body contact occurs as they come together at the end of the drive.
Rozier (MIA) and Fontecchio (DET) engage in incidental foot to foot contact in transition.
Adebayo (MIA) is actively guarding an opponent within three seconds of entering the lane.
Jaquez Jr. (MIA) legally contests Cunningham's (DET) jump shot attempt.
Duren (DET) legally contests Adebayo's (MIA) jump shot attempt.
